entry.title: To heal a broken heart
entry.summary:
Author: RiversLastSong93

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,177Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: After his breakup with Tommy, Buck spirals into a night of drinking, leaning on his closest friend, Eddie. The 118 comes together to help him forget, but the night gets out of control, leaving both Buck and Eddie waking up in a random hotel room with fuzzy memoriesâ€”and a very conspicuous golden band on their left hands. Sometimes, forgetting for a night has consequences neither of them were ready for.
